title: Get the pod IPs. Create a temp busybox pod and try hitting them on port 8080
description: Get the pod IPs. Create a temp busybox pod and try hitting them on port 8080

steps: 1. kubectl get pods -l app=foo -o wide # 'wide' will show pod IPs
3. wget -O- <POD_IP>:8080 # do not try with pod name, will not work
5. kubectl get po -o wide -l app=foo | awk '{print $6}' | grep -v IP | xargs -L1 -I '{}' kubectl run --rm -ti tmp --restart=Never --image=busybox -- wget -O- http://\{\}:8080
6. kubectl get po -l app=foo -o jsonpath='{range .items[*]}{.status.podIP}{"\n"}{end}' | xargs -L1 -I '{}' kubectl run --rm -ti tmp --restart=Never --image=busybox -- wget -O- http://\{\}:8080
